attributes.additional_details: Because they were unlawful, and have ruined the lives and businesses of the majority of the working class. It has lost people their homes, job's, education and in many cases their lives (suicide). The emergency powers have done more harm to the country, than any good that may have been intended.
attributes.background: I would like the Gov to VOID the emergency powers, they were unlawful, and should not still be in place.

rejection.details:
We understand would like certain 'powers' to be voided or annulled, however it's not clear which powers you mean.

If you are concerned about the Coronavirus Act, you might like to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608696

For clarity, the powers exercised by the Government during the pandemic were provided for in various pieces of legislation, including the Public Health Act, and Coronavirus Act, both of which were agreed by both Houses of Parliament. You can find out more about this here: https://www.legislation.gov.uk/coronavirus
